--- title: Off-canvas panel category: off-canvas order: 4 description: Off-canvas panels can be used for navigation lists, filters, and more. Panels can be positioned on the left or right side of the page.

The example below shows a panel triggered by a button in the navbar, but they can be toggled by a button anywhere using data-toggle="off-canvas" and the corresponding data-target="#..." ---
